Author: fouram444
Text: You're a voice of reason right now.  I don't think about this until it's too late, and I freaking hate how competitive I have to be with her, it shouldn't be competitive.

Author: CloudySideDown
Text: Since you mention you always win because you have an ED. You may want to chill a bit. She could be just trying to connect with you in some way and because of your ED it's making you feel competitive and you're projecting onto her. Its unfortunate that ED's especially anorexia can be so competitive with other people.
